resources.string: ได้เป็นเจ้าภาพสตรีมสด

plurals.name: supportedNbMonths
plurals.comment:
supportedNbMonths [one] [other]
Supported lishogi.org for 4 months as a Patron. The second one always says "Patron" but it's actually a link.
